verbs.description: at 1 trillion [ARG1: amazon] [V: is] [ARGM-TMP: still] [ARGM-NEG: not] [ARG2: its stock price] sept 28 2001 marked this century nadir for the stock price of amazon com inc air was gushing out of the dot com bubble the world was reeling from the 9 11 terrorist attacks and investors had lost confidence in the promises of a balding entrepreneur with an unsettling riotous laugh amazon
